text: I feel very stressed with my exams
I am overwhelmed with my workload
Deadlines are making me anxious and tired
My mind feels restless from all the stress
I feel like I’m constantly under pressure
I feel mentally drained from work
My thoughts are consumed by stress
I can’t relax because of work
I feel anxious about my future
My heart races when I think about tomorrow
I feel nervous without any reason
I feel tense when meeting new people
I get anxious even over small tasks
I feel sad and lonely today
My mood is low and unmotivated
I am angry about how I was treated
Pausing helps me control my anger
I feel afraid of the unknown
My mind races with fearful thoughts
I feel hopeless and tired of life
I feel numb most of the time
I have no energy to continue
I feel lonely even when around people
I want someone to talk to
Small connections help me feel better
I reach out to friends when lonely
I am enjoying my life right now
I feel optimistic about the future
I feel peaceful and happy and great
I feel on cloud nine and it is wonderful
I love spending time with loved ones
Good things keep happening to me
I am neither happy nor sad
I don’t feel strongly about anything
Too many things demand my attention
My head hurts from constant pressure
I can’t catch a mental break
I feel drained by daily demands
Stress is weighing heavily on me
I feel uneasy most of the time
My chest feels tight with worry
I feel tense without knowing why
My mind jumps to worst outcomes
I feel nervous before small events
I struggle to calm my thoughts
I feel anxious about everyday things
I don’t feel my usual self
I feel mad about the situation
My thoughts are filled with fear
I’m afraid things will go wrong
My fear stops me from acting
I feel very low most days
I feel empty and worn out
I wish someone would check on me
I feel alone with my thoughts
I feel neither excited nor upset
